item.description:
Last year's pie party was a success, let's have another! Come to Jess and Miranda's apartment for a casual gathering celebrating the fall. Bring a pie or dessert, homemade or otherwise to share. Bring a pie server if you have one! We'll have mulled cider, coffee, and of course Halloween candy. Hope to see you there.

The address is below and pretty easy to get to via T or driving. Parking is onstreet and plentiful. Park on Bailey St, right behind our street and enter the house from the back. For the T, take the red line to Quincy Center, its a mile walk.
item.name: Second Annual Pie Party!
